data.text: @FWanzenbock ^Hi Franz, sofern die selbe Buchungsklasse am neuen Flugdatum verfügbar ist, können wir die Umbuchung dann auch über Social Media vornehmen. Bitte schicke uns das neue Datum in einer DM. Wir schauen uns das gerne genauer an. Liebe Grüße, Sarah
@GoOutOnALim Hi Andrew, sorry to read that you are facing problems with your booking. We'll be happy to have a closer look if you want. Please send us your ticket number. Kind regards, Sarah
@MrsDawnWilsher Hi Dawn, please send us the reference number of your inquiry. Kind regards, Sara

@FWanzenbock Hallo Franz, da du dein Ticket umrouten möchtest, können wir die Änderung hier leider nicht vornehmen. :(
Darf ich dich bitten dieses Onlineformular auszufüllen: https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9 Unsere KollegInnen werden sich so rasch wie möglich bei dir melden. LG Sara

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @andrewmacdowall Hi, what's your booking reference. Kind regards, Karin
@fwanzenbock Hi, wie lautet dein Buchungscode und deine neuen Flugdaten? LG Karin
@fwanzenbock Hi Franz, nochmals, bitte deinen Buchungscode. LG Karin
@ja_le_c Hi there, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris
@marios_chris Hi, this is the link for our Feedback form: https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9. We replied to your PM on Facebook. Best regards, Susi

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @marios_chris Hi Marios, we replied to your PM on Facebook. Kind regards, Sara

data.text: @simontrains2021 Hi Simon, how can we assist you? Kind regards, Sara
@ednatro Hallo, bitte sende uns deine Email Adresse in einer DM. Gerne prüfen wir, ob wir deine Anfrage erhalten haben. LG Sara
@ClaudiaKuyu Liebe Claudia, auch die Crew trägt eine FFP2 Maske an Bord. Liebe Grüße, Ivana
@Dferdog1 Hi Geoff, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@aeb212 Hi Adam, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. If you have not been able to book the requested service in the meantime, you can also contact our colleagues via specialcases@austrian.com Kind regards, Chris
@hassensteinalex Hi Alexander, gerne leiten wir dein Feedback an unsere KollegInnen weiter und hoffen, dass deine zukünftigen Reisen wieder problemlos verlaufen werden. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: @dilemma1979 Hi there, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris

Congrats 🥳 and thanks for getting your jab 💉on our #B777 last Saturday. One lucky winner will be able to fly fully vaccinated to #NYC and enjoy the Empire State of Mind! Austrian CCO Michael Trestl personally contacted the winner today. We wish you a pleasant flight! https://t.co/OwFK8e0uvq

@hassensteinalex Hi Alexander, die Minimum Connecting Time in Wien beträgt 25 Minuten. Diese Zeit ist für den Transfer ausreichend, sofern du für den nächsten Flug eingecheckt bist. Es tut uns sehr leid, dass dies in deinem Fall nicht geklappt hat. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@hassensteinalex Hi Alexander, es tut uns leid zu hören, dass du Schwierigkeiten im Zuge deiner Reise hattest. Können wir dir noch weiterhelfen? Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@albionant Hi, please be so kind and contact the official authorities regarding entry regulations. Kind regards, Karin
@5timeslfcx Hi, a name change is not possible, but she will be totally fine, this happens a lot and it does not matter at all. Kind regards, Karin
Vaccinating to the waltz beat 💃 200 flight enthusiasts got their jab in the #B777 today. Thanks to @flughafen_wien and @roteskreuznoe for teamwork ✈️💉 https://t.co/MZ7YYelvcm

@thausbrandt Hi Thomas, we are sorry that you were facing difficulties with the registration. As the chip is integrated in the cover of your passport please put your phone on the passport so the chip can be read. Kind regards, Chris
@Mahbuba21 Hi, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Did you get the information that your bag will be delivered today? Best regards, Susi

@ptomelitsch Hallo Patrick, uns liegen diesbezüglich noch keine Informationen vor. 
Liebe Grüße, Sarah
@ptomelitsch Hi Patrick, meinst du  im Hinblick auf die Passagierzahlen? Liebe Grüße
@GDiGIT_BE @FlyingBrussels Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine

@HVaughanJones Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Please contact directly our colleagues from the arrival service. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.
Kind regards, Christine
@arbersylejmani Hi Arber, sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please provide us with your booking code and we'll have a closer look at this matter. Kind regards, James
@Bas1411 Hi, we already processed your tax refund and sent you a confirmation by e-mail. Kind regards, James

Spread your wings and get vaccinated! 💉✈️
This Saturday, we transform one of our #B777 into a one of a kind vaccination center. Together with @flughafen_wien & @roteskreuznoe we invite you to get your jab and win tickets to #NYC on top of immunity! 

👉https://t.co/fwsstMoae6 https://t.co/jn3iXLydII
@betous29 Hi, could you please private message us your claim number? We'll have a closer look at this matter. Kind regards, James
@BirLost Hi, we already sent a note of urgency to our respective colleagues. You will be contacted soon. Kind regards, James

@BirLost Hi there, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding your refund: https://t.co/qtHWqUZJ9O Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @shabbir_hanif Hi there, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue.  Please contact our responsible department via the following form regarding a follow-up: https://t.co/qtHWqUZJ9O Our colleagues will get back to you. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @Alex19990669498 Hi there, I just replied to your PM on FB. Kind regards, Ivana
@GCsibra Hi Gergely, you can send an e-mail to impressum@austrian.com it will then be forwarded to the respective department. Kind regards, Ivana
@gcsibra Hi Gergely, here's the correct online form https://t.co/4q8fSgwzkD Sorry for any inconvenience caused. Kind regards, James

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @MichalBottka Hi Michal, you do not need a test for your stay on board. However, if your end destination requires a test, you will be asked to show your test result before boarding the flight. Best regards, Christiane
@GCsibra Hi there, have you been able to fill out the web form? Kind regards, Ivana

@christopherbdot Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report .Thank you. 
Kind regards,Christine
@IkaFerrerGotic Hi Ika, I'm sorry that our service didn't meet your expectations. Please fill out our online form  https://t.co/xSuR0u4TUs to bring your concern to notice. Best regards, Christine

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Federeffa_Q Hi , please mind that we are no longer offer any flights to Linate, unfortunately. Thank you anyway for your feedback we will forward it to our respective department. Kind regards, Christine

@GCsibra Hi Gergely, did you use the desktop version or the mobile version to open the page? There is only a contact form, and our colleagues will contact you via your email address. Kind regards, Derya

@GCsibra Hi Gergely, thank you for reaching out. Please forward your inquiry by filling out the following contact form https://t.co/LjqOF6d2Rl. It will be forwarded to the respective department. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @VongSoftware Hi, es tut uns leid, dass unser Buchungssystem bei dir für Ärger gesorgt hat, dennoch bitten wir dich um eine höffliche Ausdrucksweise. Liebe Grüße, Derya

@DMusokeri Hi, at most airports, you can keep your foldable prams or pushchairs up to a maximum of ten kilograms with you until shortly before boarding.
At Vienna Airport, prams and pushchairs must be handed over to the large baggage desk. Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @lazarkarapandza [1/2] Hi Lazar, thank you for reaching out and sharing your honest feedback with us. We're saddened to hear about your bad experience with us and that you felt mistreated by our gate staff. We will definitely bring your feedback

@lazarkarapandza [2/2] to the attention of our respective departments in order to improve our service standards. We look forward to providing you with a smoother experience next time. Kind regards, James
@beyondfreefall Hi Wendy, if you tried to fill out the form via a mobile device then please switch to the desktop version. Best regards, Susi
@TravellingMcDs Hi James, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll take a closer look into this matter. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@lestavelt Hi Thomas, please private message us your booking code and we'll have a closer look at your request. Kind regards, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@ColinBray Hi Colin, thank you for your kind words

As always, it was a pleasure having you on Board @skrapid! ⚽ Next time, we will fly you to a win again! ⚽💪🏼

#Servus #AustrianAirlines #Rapid #SKRapidWien #SCR #DZGSCR https://t.co/OHFpHPBLcO

@erinthibodeau Hi Erin, we are sorry you still haven't got an answer yet. Unfortunately, we can't tell you a specific time of response. Right now we have a lot of inquiries. Still, we can assure you that our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you asap. Best regards, Christiane

@Leonardo280688 Hi Leonardo, you cannot receive the boarding pass for your return flight online, if the return flight is also open for check-in, before you have used the outbound flight. Best regards, Christiane

Ready, set, SMILE!🤗
From 9 Nov, @Miles_and_More members can use our biometrics facial recognition service and enjoy contactless boarding! Together with @flughafen_wien we want to make your journey as smooth as possible! 

More Info: https://t.co/CW3UGQ6iZ0

#ConnectingTheWorld https://t.co/PWkptZgVxP
@triconoutsoId Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@Frizzworld Hi Melissa, of course, you can send us a DM with your request. Kind regards, Chris
@frizzworld Hi Melissa, sorry for the inconvenience caused. How can we assist you? Kind regards, James
@mmuehlberger Hi Markus, please send us your booking code. We´ll check that for you. Kind regards, Derya
@Fuxi2104 Hi, es tut uns sehr leid, dass du dich ärgern musstest und mit unserem Service nicht zufrieden warst. Können wir etwas für dich tun? Liebe Grüße, Derya
@ednatro Hallo, bitte schick uns deine Anfrage an impressum@austrian.com. Dein Anliegen wird dann intern an die zuständige Fachabteilung weitegeleitet. Liebe Grüße, Christiane
@thisaidashirazi  Hi, sorry for the long waiting time. Thank you for your patience until now. Please be assure that our colleagues are doing their utmost to solve this issue. Best regards, Susi
@ednatro Hi, versuchst du den Link über ein mobiles Endgerät oder einen PC aufzurufen? Liebe Grüße, Susi
@ednatro Hi Ed, leider gibt es keine Email Adresse. Es läuft alles über das Kontaktformular probiere mal https://t.co/jtEMI9blr0. Liebe Grüße, Derya

@Rilindja8 Hi there, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs. How can we help you? Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@warrenletton Hi Warren, thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to hear that you had reason to complain. Please feel free to send us your complaint via the following contact form https://t.co/4ZRbdgexbN. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Lisa_Ranieri Hi Lisa, we regret to hear that you were affected by a delay. Please accept my sincere apologies for any inconvenience this has caused. Please send us your feedback by filling out the contact form via https://t.co/4ZRbdgexbN. Kind regards, Derya

data.text:
Italian support for the Hirschwang region in Lower Austria!

Austrian Airlines currently holds two Italian #Canadair fire-fighting aircraft in our hangar at @flughafen_wien  to support the local firefighters. We hope for the soon end of the fires! 🙏 

#LovingTheWorld #heroes https://t.co/5Np2UKssC0

data.text: @CarolinabrrsC @lufthansaNews @lufthansa @FlySWISS Hi Carolina, thank you for reaching out. We regret to hear that your refund request is still pending. data.text: @ednatro Hi Ed, welche Seite wolltest du denn aufmachen? Hast du es auch schon in einem anderen Browser probiert? Liebe Grüße, Derya
@mimilabelle Hi, please be so kind and get in touch with the lost property counter at the airport in London. Kind regards, Karin
@anike777 Hi Ani, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris
@ttasovac @austr Hi, you an contact also our colleagues via this e-mail address https://t.co/WBd3FgJtcg.vie@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine
@katy180900 Hi, in order to bring your complaint to notice please send your inquiry to our feedback management https://t.co/xSuR0u4TUs. Kind regards, Christine

urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @siouzos Hi, we are sorry that you are not able to reach your connecting flight. Kindly contact our colleagues at the respective service center concerning a rebooking. Kind regards, Christine
@lizz_robinson Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

@ttasovac Hi Toma,we are sorry to hear your bag did not arrive with you. Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR. The contact person there will be glad to assist you.Kind regards, Christine
@GkKsS3 Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@nunyo_bidness Hi Gloria, we are not able to choose the requested seat, unfortunately. Please contact directly Lufthansa at the gate. Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @nunyo_bidness Hi, your seat is 2E at the moment. Which one would you prefer? Best regards, Susi

With a heavy heart we say goodbye to our #B767 OE-LAW! 
Today, our crew is operating the aircraft’s last regular flight going to New York 👋🏼 #Servus https://t.co/KeAuIZsc2X
@JosieCresswell Hi, how can we assist you? Kind regards, Christine
@jimmcdonald10 Hi James, please check out the Upgrade options under the following link: https://t.co/AmhGGa8hfL. Kind regards, Ivana

urls.title: Upgrades
urls.description: Find out here about all the options for booking an upgrade. Well in advance or at short notice - you decide.

data.text:
#ServusThailand! On 1 November gates will open again for fully vaccinated travelers from Austria and other countries! 🌴🇹🇭

With up to five weekly flights to Bangkok we bring you closer to the fascination of #Thailand.

#Lovingtheworld #TogetherAgain #SoutheastAsia https://t.co/rD7iLa38zQ
@CJRockett1 Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM so that we are able to have a closer look. Kind regards, Christine

@ClaudiaLoidolt Liebe Claudia, ich habe soeben deine DM beantwortet.  Im Namen unserer Mitarbeiter bitte ich dich, von einer öffentlichen Nennung unserer Mitarbeiter abzusehen und bitte dich dein Beitrag zu entfernen. Danke. Liebe Grüße, Ivana
@adhorrig Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Sara
@Austriannomad Hi, well, who can tell the weather conditions for tomorrow ;-) But at the moment everthing is scheduled. Best regards, Karin
@Austriannomad Hi, we don't have the exact booking numbers but I guess you are staff on standby? It does look ok from the selling. Kind regards, Karin
@ClaudiaLoidolt Hallo Claudia, wie können wir dir behilflich sein? Gerne kannst du dich auch direkt an unsere KollegInnen am Serviceschalter am Flughafen Wien wenden. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

@JanAtTwitte_r Hallo Jan, für deinen Aufenthalt bei uns Bord benötigst du gar keinen Test. Sollte jedoch deine Zieldestination einen Test zur Einreise verlangen, musst du das negative Testergebnis bereits vor dem Boarding vorweisen. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

We carry Austria in our ❤ and into the world!

Happy National Day, Austria! 🇦🇹
 
#Servus #AustrianNationalDay #CharmingAustria https://t.co/hdk2QnYaEY

¡Hola Cancún! 🇲🇽

12 hours after takeoff, OS95 landed safe and sound at @Cancun_Airport! Upon arrival, our Mexican colleagues and partners welcomed our crew and passengers with a wet refreshment!💦✈️

#ServusCancún #HolaMéxico #LovingTheWorld https://t.co/qnYlBqWgUq
@akhaelss @flughafen_wien Hi Alex, ich hoffe du hast mittlerweile dein Gepäck erhalten. Liebe Grüße, Susi

@arnowallet Hi there, we regret to hear that you were affected by a delay. Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience this has caused. Please fill out this contact form https://t.co/Kgi4BKYCJy to submit your claim. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
¡A Cancún! 🇲🇽🌮

New adventures ahead: today we took off from Vienna to Cancún for the first time since 2006. Passengers on our fully booked maiden flight already started the fiesta with Mexican rhythms at the gate @flughafen_wien! 

#ServusCancún #NewAdventures #Bienvenidos https://t.co/q8qCFEiuLt
@arnowallet Hi there, we regret to hear that you were affected by a flight irregularity. How can we assist you? Kind regards, Sara
